Import from CSV file

You can import lists of content using the {{ template.name }} Excel Template file. To ensure content imports easily, follow the steps below:

  1. Download the Excel Template for this Feature Collection
  2. Only update content within the first Worksheet, do not update column names
  3. Save the Excel Template as a CSV
  4. Return to this Import page, drag and drop the file into this page
  5. Confirm the file is ready for import by clicking the Begin Import button
